features: SYMMETRICAL SHAPE - Worrying about turning baby’s pacifier over and over for the right fit is a thing of the past with a binky from MAM. Always right-side up and fuss free.
SILICONE NIPPLE - The BPA-free silicone nipple is a signature MAM pacifier design, with silky SkinSoft material and a symmetrical shape that's ideal for jaw and teeth development.
STERILIZING STORAGE CASE - Add water and pop into the microwave to sterilize MAM pacifiers in just 3 minutes. No separate sterilizer means fewer baby items to take on the go!
COMFORTABLE SHIELD - These cute pacifiers for toddlers are fun and functional. The curved shield with openings keeps older babies comfortable and allow skin to breathe.
PRODUCT DETAILS - MAM Animal Pacifiers, 2 pack, 16-Plus Months Pacifiers, Boy, Baby Pacifier Case, Includes 1 Sterilizing Pacifier Holder Case
body.description: "Keep your toddler calm with a binky that you will both love. The MAM Original Pacifier was developed by leading pediatric dentists and developmental psychologists to provide maximum comfort and style for babies sixteen months and older.* MAM pacifiers feature an innovative nipple designed to promote healthy oral development so you can soothe your toddler with confidence. Older babies will love latching onto the soothing pacifier nipple that, with the help of a built-in air channel, naturally flattens and extends when sucked, mimicking a human nipple during breastfeeding. And all MAM pacifiers are orthodontic, featuring a symmetrical nipple that fits perfectly in baby's mouth at any angle. MAM's medically engineered nipples all feature life-like, SkinSoft textured silicone that feels more natural, just like mom. With multiple pacifier shapes and shield sizes to pick from, MAM nipples are easily accepted by babies of all ages, with 94% nipple acceptance among babies tested.** Babies simply love the ease and comfort of latching onto MAM nipples. Plus, the sterilizing storage case makes it easy to keep baby safe from germs with fast, easy cleaning right in the box. Microwave disinfection is proven effective in killing common household germs and bacteria. Pacifiers kept in the closed box will remain disinfected for up to 48 hours: Fill pacifier case with water. Place pacifier in the pacifier case with the nipple facing down. Follow pacifier package instructions for microwave setting. Cool completely before use. *Developed with the International Children's Medical Research Society. ** Market Research 2009-2017, tested with 1,508 babies."

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Parenting is hard. We make stuff to make it easier. MAM knows that being a parent is not always easy, so we make products that are smart and simple to use. For over 45 years we've been obsessed with making innovative pacifiers, bottles, cups, teethers, and toothbrushes, providing babies with optimal care at all stages. MAM Original Orthodontic Pacifier 2 Original Pacifiers with Sterilizing Case MAM's BPA/BPS-free Original Pacifiers have been developed by pediatric dentists and developmental psychologists to provide maximum comfort and style for babies ages 16+ months*. MAM’s pacifiers combine technological innovation and trendsetting design to help give babies a healthy start in life. *Developed in conjunction with the International Children’s Medical Research Society SkinSoft silicone nipple feels soft and familiar like mom Anti-slip texture helps nipple stay comfortably in baby’s mouth Curved shield allows the pacifier to sit comfortably on baby’s face Shield openings allow air to circulate and baby’s skin to breathe

Air holes in shield allow baby's skin to breathe Symmetrical nipple promotes healthy oral development by reducing pressure on incoming teeth SkinSoft silicone nipple offers a familiar feel Self sterilizing case sterilizes in the microwave in just 3 minutes

MAM Perfect Pacifier MAM Perfect Night Pacifier MAM Air Pacifier MAM Original Pacifier MAM Original Pacifiers Nipple Size 6+ Months 16+ Months 16+ Months 16+ Months 16+ Months SkinSoft Textured Silicone Nipple ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Textured Shield (Reduces Skin Irritation) ✓ ✓ Extra Air Exposure (For Sensitive Skin) ✓ Extra Thin & Flexible Orthodontic Nipple ✓ ✓ Quantity 2 2 3 2 3 Includes Self-Sterilizing Box ✓ ✓ ✓ Glows in the Dark ✓ 2 of 3 1 of 3

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well for 18 month old
reviews.reviewText: Our 18 month old rarely uses a pacifier, but sometimes when we're traveling he finds them soothing. The ones we had were too small for him at this point so I decided to order these. They're quite a hit and seem to be well made. I also like that they come with a carrying case. Only negative to note: If you tend to clip pacifiers to the child's shirt (the clips that are attached to fabric and are fantastic!), the attachment part is unlikely to fit on these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, toddler-approved paci's
reviews.reviewText: Mam makes awesome pacifiers. Our toddler loves them! As an added benefit, they have adorable animal designs and come in a plastic holder, which makes it easy to take them with you in a diaper bag. I think this is the best brand of pacifiers-- I highly recommend them for newborns through toddlers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The only pacifier my son will use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Mam pacifiers have been our sons favorite from the start. Easy to clean in that they come with a box you can easily sanitize them in. The nipple shape is very natural and babies seem to really take to them. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Every baby is different
reviews.reviewText: My son is 2 and we have been a MA house since he was born. Every baby is different but I tried other brands with my son when he was a newborn and they would just fall out. Once he tried the MAM he was hooked. We have bought many sizes of these pacifiers and have even bought some little animal to attach to them when he was really small and was having trouble putting the pacifier back in. We love these pacifier and I would recommend trying them out if you have a fussy little one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thankful for this bigger size.
reviews.reviewText: We have used Mam binkies for over 18 years for our 7 kids. They are the best! I recently bought this bigger size for my 2 year old who has some sensory seeking issues and really needs still at bedtime for self regulation. I appreciate they are made for bigger toddlers. We are still trying to limit use as his dentist said his pallet has negative changes and his binky use has impacted his teeth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sons favorite pacifier.
reviews.reviewText: We love these pacifiers. My youngest son is the only one of my kids that has been a pacifier baby and the MAM ones are his favorite by far. They're great quality and they have held up really well throughout all the sizes we've gone through.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars barely larger than the previous size
reviews.reviewText: My toddler is almost about 15 months old and we needed to replace some binkies since he often chews on them. I was looking for a large size and was excited to find these. However the difference between this size and the one under it is sooooo tiny! Such a small difference I will just purchase smaller size since those come in more options/colors etc. Great pacifier, it is a TEENY TINY bit larger, great quality like all MAM binkies but honestly the size difference isn’t worth being stuck with a house full of this patterned binkie lol
LLEGO A TIEMPO Y EN CONDICIONES ADECUADAS
